Room.Name: Hofton Avenue
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Hofton Avenue, north of the Oceancrest Guard Barracks.
Room.LongDescription: The Oceancrest Guard Barracks house more than a thousand of Oceancrest's finest troops, providing protection to the city by patrolling the streets, city walls and the observational stations. The large City Walls can be seen to the north, as they run parallel to Hofton Avenue.
